Consultant

Company: Deloitte
Location: Delhi, India
LinkedIn post

We are currently hiring for Consultants/Senior Analyst for our Cyber Security team, Below are the Job Specs:


Consultant:

  • B.E./ B.Tech./ MTech. / MCA in CS/IT/ECE or similar discipline from an institute recognized by UGC / AICTE.
  • Minimum 3 years’ experience in Security Assessment/GRC/Network Security/ISMS review or implementation.
  • At least one Certification from the CISSP / CISM / CISA/ OSCP/ OSCE/ ISCP/ ISO 27001/ ISO20000 / SABSA/ GSOC


Analyst/Senior Analyst:

  • B.E./ B.Tech./ MTech. / MCA in CS/IT/ECE or similar discipline from an institute recognized by UGC / AICTE.
  • Minimum 1 years’ experience in Security Assessment/Network Security/ISMS review or implementation/Vulnerability Assessment/Forensics
  • At least one Certification from the following: CEH/CISM/CISA/ISO 27001/ISO 31000/ISO 22301


Type of employment:


Full time and Contractual basis the experience and certifications

  • All the job profiles are publicly listed on recruitment platforms
